Side note: Ben and Jerry's was sold to Unilever more than ten years ago, I believe, and is now sold under their spin off, the Magnum Ice Cream Company.  Now, I boycotted Ben and Jerry's way back when and it pretty much stuck with me after learning Ben and Jerry were no longer receiving any of my pennies if I was to buy it, mostly because I'm also not a fan of Unilever and their DEI policies.  I will say, however, that Unilever has scaled back their DEI promotion and policies recently, booted their social activist CEO, told Ben and Jerry to forget it when they offered a buy-back, and now appear to be mostly neutral, even defending themselves ina lawsuit against Ben and Jerry for exactly this, so I might buy a pint of Dublin Mudslide is it's on sale. permalink award report block reply Honkey_McCracker 9 points 2 days ago Never ate it anyway.
